hudson.tasks.Shell.command:
source /home/test/.bashrc #Set the below parameters manually package_name="r-base" published_version="3.4.3"
source /home/test/.bashrc #Check distro and available version in repo : rhel7.x, Sles11.x/12.x, Ub16.x/17.x . /etc/os-release if [ $ID == "rhel" ]; then available_version=$(sudo yum info $package_name | grep Version | head -1 | cut -d ':' -f 2| cut -d ' ' -f 2) elif [ $ID == "sles" ]; then available_version=$(sudo zypper info $package_name | grep Version | head -1 | cut -d ':' -f 2| cut -d ' ' -f 2) elif [ $ID == "ubuntu" ]; then available_version=$(sudo apt-get update && sudo apt-cache policy $package_name | grep Candidate | head -1 | cut -d ' ' -f 4) fi
if [[ $available_version == *"$published_version"* ]]; then echo "Version $published_version is already available in repo" echo "Exact name: $available_version ... Failing" exit 1 else echo "Published version is not available in repo. Going ahead." fi ########################
source /home/test/.bashrc sudo yum install -y wget tar make rpm-build.s390x help2man zlib-devel xz-devel ncurses-devel cairo-devel gcc-c++ libcurl-devel libjpeg-devel libpng-devel libtiff-devel readline-devel fdupes texlive-helvetic texlive-metafont texlive-psnfss texlive-times xdg-utils pango-devel tcl-devel tk-devel xorg-x11-devel perl-macros texinfo gcc-gfortran libXt-devel java-1.8.0-openjdk-devel perl-Text-Unidecode.noarch bzip2-devel pcre-devel export JAVA_HOME=/usr/lib/jvm/java-1.8.0-openjdk wget https://cran.r-project.org/src/base/R-3/R-3.4.3.tar.gz tar zxvf R-3.4.3.tar.gz cd R-3.4.3 ./configure --with-x=no make sudo make install echo $PATH export LANG="en_US.UTF-8" make check echo "sessionInfo()" | R --save
